mapper.select: select no, id, password, phone_number as phoneNumber, email, reg_date as regDate, type, name from ${db}.member where state='회원' limit ${size} offset #{offset}
select no, id, password, phone_number as phoneNumber, email, reg_date as regDate, type, name from ${db}.member where state='회원' and ${option} like '%${keyword}%' limit ${size} offset #{offset}
